trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click"></xref> event of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Adja meg az adatait a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click"> </xref> az esemény egy <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"> </xref> vezérlő.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>esemény jelenik meg, amikor egy <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objektum egy <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>vezérlő kattint.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>

trans-unit.source: To allow a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event, you must first set either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `HotSpotMode.PostBack`.
trans-unit.target: Engedélyezi a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objektum kell kiadni a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>esemény, először meg kell adnia vagy a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>tulajdonság vagy a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>tulajdonságot `HotSpotMode.PostBack`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: To control the actions programmatically that are performed when a postback <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> is clicked, provide an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: A műveleteket, programozott módon, hogy úgy hajtja végre a visszaküldés <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>van eseménykezelő kattintott, adja meg a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>esemény.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A> property stores a string that is associated with the behavior of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object when clicked.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A>a tulajdonság tárolja azt karakterlánc, amely a társított viselkedését a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objektum kattintáskor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: This string is passed in the ImageMapEventArgs event data when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Ez a karakterlánc átadott ImageMapEventArgs eseményadatok amikor a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>kattint.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Ez a konstruktor segítségével <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs>osztály</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs> új példányának inicializálása

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Az alábbi táblázat az <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs>osztály</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs> példánya kezdeti tulajdonságértékek

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs.PostBackValue%2A>|The string assigned to the `value` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: | Tulajdonság |} A kezdeti érték |} |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs.PostBackValue%2A>| A karakterlánc rendelt a `value` paraméter. |}</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs.PostBackValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> object assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> object that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>rendelt objektum a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue*>tulajdonsága a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"> </xref> objektum, amely kattintott.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.String> assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> object that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref:System.String>rendelt a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue*>tulajdonsága a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"> </xref> objektum, amely kattintott.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Use this property to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Ez a tulajdonság programozott hozzáférés a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A>tulajdonsága a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objektum egy <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>vezérlője kattintott.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> object that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>rendelt a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue*>tulajdonsága a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"> </xref> objektum, amely kattintott.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue*> </xref:System.String>
